title: 'The JSON object is invalid' Every task results in a 'do_nothing' command

labels.name: setup
labels.description: Issues with getting Auto-GPT setup on local machines

body: ### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️ - [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem ### GPT-3 or GPT-4 - [ ] I am using Auto-GPT with GPT-3 (GPT-3.5) ### Steps to reproduce 🕹 I've added the file_operations.py file that seemed to work for others on this reddit thread: https://www.reddit.com/r/AutoGPT/comments/12j70go/saving_files/ I am trying to have autogpt use information found online related to my original prompt to create and add data to an excel file. It is doing a fine job finding the relevant information, but cannot create or save a file. ### Current behavior 😯 every next action gives a 'do_nothing' so it is doing nothing. ### Expected behavior 🤔 I am trying to get autogpt to create an excel file, use information from a folder on my desktop and the internet to complete my objective. In this case, it is to create a business proposal for a liquor store (job I did on upwork a while back - trying to replicate with autogpt) IF ANYONE CAN HELP I WOULD APPRECIATE A TON ### Your prompt 📝 ```yaml # Paste your prompt here ```
